page.title: 09SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content: Public meetings have been held to discuss:Speed control of A416 traffic which cuts village in half.No action resulted from Council.Use of empty school-Community Association formed. Threatened privatisation/closure of bus service.Survey of all houses undertaken.Bus sevice essential to minority of inhabitants.Great social concern expressed about:1 Post Office is essential to village life & has been here for 100yrs.The old,infirm & disadvantaged rely on the shop.It is also a great meeting place which breaks down social barriers & keeps community in touch.The shop would not be viable with out the Post Office & village life would be impossible for many people without the shop or bus service.2 Footways & bridleways to be kept open.3 Petition against large lo- rries.4Objections to clay pigeon shoot
